Module: AccountsApi

API for interacting with accounts.

More info: https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/accounts

Methods

<inner> create(params [, callback])

Create a new account.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params module:AccountsApi~createRequest Parameters for account creation.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Newly created account.
Type
Promise.<Account>

<inner> createBatch(params [, callback])

Create multiple new accounts.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params Array.<module:AccountsApi~createRequest> Parameters for creation of multiple accounts.
callback batchCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Newly created accounts.
Type
Promise.<BatchResponse.<Account>>

<inner> createControlProgram(params [, callback])

Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params Object Object containing either alias or ID identifying account to create control program for.
Properties
Name Type Argument Description
alias String <optional>
 An account alias. Either this or `id` is required.
id String <optional>
 An account ID. Either this or `alias` is required.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Deprecated:
  • as of version 1.1. Use #createReceiver instead. Create a new control program, specifying either an account ID or account alias to indicate the controlling party.

    More info: https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/control-programs#account-control-programs
Returns:
Newly created control program.
Type
Promise.<Object>

<inner> createReceiver(params [, callback])

Create a new receiver under the specified account.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params module:AccountsApi~createReceiverRequest Parameters for receiver creation.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Newly created receiver.
Type
Promise.<Receiver>

<inner> createReceiverBatch(params [, callback])

Create multiple receivers under the specified accounts.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Description
params Array.<module:AccountsApi~createReceiverRequest> Parameters for creation of multiple receivers.
callback batchCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Newly created receivers.
Type
Promise.<BatchResponse.<Receiver>>

<inner> query(params [, callback])

Get one page of accounts matching the specified query.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
params Object {} Filter and pagination information.
Properties
Name Type Description
filter String Filter string, see https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/queries.
filterParams Array.<(String|Number)> Parameter values for filter string (if needed).
pageSize Number Number of items to return in result set.
callback pageCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
Requested page of results.
Type
Promise.<Page.<Account>>

<inner> queryAll(params, processor [, callback])

Request all accounts matching the specified query, calling the supplied processor callback with each item individually.
Parameters:
Name Type Argument Default Description
params Object {} Filter and pagination information.
Properties
Name Type Description
filter String Filter string, see https://chain.com/docs/core/build-applications/queries.
filterParams Array.<(String|Number)> Parameter values for filter string (if needed).
pageSize Number Number of items to return in result set.
processor QueryProcessor.<Account> Processing callback.
callback objectCallback <optional>
 Optional callback. Use instead of Promise return value as desired.
Returns:
A promise resolved upon processing of all items, or rejected on error.
Type
Promise

Type Definitions

createReceiverRequest

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Argument Description
accountAlias String <optional>
 The unique alias of the account. accountAlias or accountId must be provided.
accountId String <optional>
 The unique ID of the account. accountAlias or accountId must be provided.
expiresAt String <optional>
 An RFC3339 timestamp indicating when the receiver will cease to be valid. Defaults to 30 days in the future.

createRequest

Type:
  • Object
Properties:
Name Type Argument Description
alias String <optional>
 User specified, unique identifier.
rootXpubs Array.<String> The list of keys used to create control programs under the account.
quorum Number The number of keys required to sign transactions for the account.
tags Object <optional>
 User-specified tag structure for the account.
